channel.title: Tag: politics - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Heartbroken
item.description: TL;DR: My heart is broken. Less shitposting. More thinking. Hopefully something productive, soon.

item.title: In praise of dumb pipes – or, ISPs: please don’t get smart with me!
item.description: Something Iâ€™m having trouble finding these days is a dumb pipe. I just want a dumb pipe to the internet going to my house, and to the computer in my pocket. Let me give you money for bandwidth, and then butt out.
